Description: The following statement contains a magic number: foreach(HtmlNode node in col)  			{  				string href = node.Attributes["href"].Value;  				if (href.StartsWith("irc://"' StringComparison.CurrentCulture))  				{  					string[] strs = href.Split(new[] { '/' });  					string serverName = strs [2].ToLower();  					string channelName = strs [3].ToLower();    					Server s = Servers.Server(serverName);  					if (s == null)  					{  						Servers.Add(serverName);  						s = Servers.Server(serverName);  						_log.Debug("-> " + serverName);  					}    					Channel c = s.Channel(channelName);  					if (c == null)  					{  						s.AddChannel(channelName);  						_log.Debug("-> " + serverName + " - " + channelName);  					}  				}  			}
